name: Separated
description: Separated is a top-down puzzle game in which a soul is separated into different dimensions. To rescue the kidnapped soul from the dark world, the blob must reach the portals by navigating a series of mazes and avoiding enemies. ::Intended conditions - Both player characters must reach portal to continue to next level. I have been unable to make this mechanic work but feel free to attempt this on your own, it makes the game more challenging.::(Made with Stencyl)
